LanguageData.GraniteFlagstoneOverwater.label: granite overwater
LanguageData.GraniteFlagstoneOverwater.description:
A very good road of flagstone placed directly on water, nice to walk but doesn't support much weight.
•Support only light builds. •Set on water, mud, marsh. •Fast, neutral beauty.

LanguageData.OverwaterSimpleRoad.label: simple road overwater
LanguageData.OverwaterSimpleRoad.description:
A simple road built from simple materials, work to walk.
•Support only light builds. •Set on water, mud, marsh. •Slow, dirty and ugly.
